thread.title: Elayne Ely
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Elayne Ely

author: Elayne Ely
title: Elayne Ely
text: If you are a lover of nature and are eager to do and see things that will change your life this is the trip for you. The knowledge, the friendships with people as well as animals that you will be introduced to will stay with you forever. Antarctica is nothing that you have ever experienced in your life before and it leaves you in awe, the silence, the undisturbed beauty is breathtaking, hard to describe to anyone that has not been there. It's an expedition that will challenge all your senses as well as your body and brain power. I was challenged in many ways. I loved the trip. Elayne Ely
